UI_setting_dispersionCircleScale_tooltip:
This parameter affects what the additional summation circle will be in the result.
 If the value is 0.3 (30%), then the circle will be the minimum possible,
 and at 1.0 (100%) - the maximum, i.e. without changes.
It is not recommended to set a value lower than 65%.
UI_setting_useServerDispersion_tooltip: Enabling the feature will create an extra server lapping circle.
